value.title: How to deploy your web app using GitHub Actions | Azure Portal Series
value.excerpt: In this video of the Azure Portal “How To” Series, learn how to deploy Azure web apps using GitHub Actions. value.title: How to edit and debug code in real time with Visual Studio Code Live Share | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you’ll learn how to instantly and securely share your current project, debugging session, terminal instance, localhost web app, and voice and text chat with Live Share extension for Visual Studio Code. value.title: How to use Jupyter Notebooks in Azure Data Studio | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Vicky Harp joins Scott Hanselman to show how Azure Data Studio combined the simple and robust SQL query editing experience of tools like SSMS with the flexibility and collaboration of Jupyter Notebooks. The November 2019 release of Azure Data Studio included SQL Server 2019 Guide as a Jupyter Book, which

value.title: Learn all about Distributed Application Runtime (Dapr), Part 1 | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Aman Bhardwaj and Yaron Schneider join Scott Hanselman to talk about the core concepts of Distributed Application Runtime (Dapr). Dapr is a portable, event-driven runtime that makes it easy for developers to build resilient, microservice stateless and stateful applications that run on the cloud and edge

value.title: Build the intelligent edge with Azure IoT Edge
value.excerpt: Follow this learning path for a broad and compelling introduction to the fundamentals of building IoT solutions with Azure IoT.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure IoT Edge
topItems.excerpt: University of Oxford

topItems.title: Deploy a pre-built module to the Edge device
topItems.excerpt: University of Oxford

topItems.title: Set up an IoT Edge Gateway
topItems.excerpt: This module is theoretical and will walk you through how an IoT Edge device can be used as a gateway.

value.title: Create conversational AI solutions
value.excerpt: Conversational AI revolves around user interactions, in this case through Bots. In this learning path, you will learn how to create chat bots and integrate the bot with various AI services to add intelligence to the interaction. Learn how to integrate the QnA Maker Service (an easy method to add question and answers for bots), and explore the new Virtual Assistant scenarios for creating branded experiences with bots.

topItems.title: Build a chat bot with the Azure portal
topItems.excerpt: Create and test a basic chat bot using the Azure portal

topItems.title: Design a bot conversation flow
topItems.excerpt: Learn the principles of good bot design and implement conversational flows, knowledge bots, and how to hand-off interactions to a human.

topItems.title: Create a Bot with the Bot Framework Composer
topItems.excerpt: User the Bot Framework Composer to quickly and easily build sophisticated conversational bots without writing code.

value.title: Describe the capabilities of Microsoft compliance solutions
value.excerpt: Describe the capabilities of Microsoft compliance solutions

topItems.title: Describe the compliance management capabilities in Microsoft
topItems.excerpt: Describe the compliance management capabilities in Microsoft

topItems.excerpt: Describe resource governance capabilities in Azure

topItems.excerpt: Describe basic security capabilities in Azure

topItems.title: Describe security management capabilities of Azure
topItems.excerpt: Describe security management capabilities of Azure

topItems.title: Describe security capabilities of Azure Sentinel
topItems.excerpt: Describe security capabilities of Azure Sentinel

value.title: Evaluate text with Azure Cognitive Language Services
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Cognitive Language Services to analyze text, determine intent, detect adult themes, and process natural language input

topItems.title: Classify and moderate text with Azure Content Moderator
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Azure Content Moderator and show how to use it for text moderation

topItems.title: Add conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) and show how to build and publish a LUIS model

topItems.title: Discover sentiment in text with the Text Analytics API
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use the Text Analytics API and Azure Functions to discover what your customers are really saying in their feedback about your products or brands.

value.title: Plan and implement a high availability and disaster recovery environment
value.excerpt: Data must be available when needed. Configure, test and manage a solution for high availability and disaster recovery using Azure tools and SQL Server tools.

topItems.title: Describe high availability and disaster recovery strategies
topItems.excerpt: Plan appropriate HA/DR strategy based on RTO and RPO. Choose best solution for IaaS or PaaS deployments or hybrid workloads.

topItems.title: Explore IaaS and PaaS platform tools for high availability and disaster recovery
topItems.excerpt: Deploy Windows Server Failover Cluster and AGs in Azure and hybrid environments. Configure temporal tables, geo-replication and auto failover groups.

topItems.title: Back up and restore databases
topItems.excerpt: Plan and implement policy for recovering data in case of user error or failure of technology. Explore various options for how and where to backup and restore databases.

topItems.excerpt: Describe security capabilities of Azure Sentinel

topItems.title: Describe the compliance management capabilities in Microsoft
topItems.excerpt: Describe the compliance management capabilities in Microsoft

topItems.title: Describe resource governance capabilities in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Describe resource governance capabilities in Azure

value.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value
value.excerpt: Explore the strategic components, use cases, and special factors of an enterprise AI strategy that creates real business value, with INSEAD and Microsoft.

value.title: Deploy a containerized application on Azure Kubernetes Service
value.excerpt: Explore how to create and deploy a containerized application by using Azure Kubernetes Service declarative manifest files.

value.title: Optimize compute costs on Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS)
value.excerpt: Explore strategies that you can use on Azure to optimize your cloud-native application-development process by using Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS).

value.title: Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks
value.excerpt: Create an Azure Notebook and use three popular Python libraries to analyze climate data collected by NASA, then share it.

images.title: Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks

value.title: Threat detection with Azure Sentinel analytics
value.excerpt: Threat detection with Azure Sentinel analytics

value.title: Dynamically meet changing web app performance requirements with autoscale rules
value.excerpt: Respond to periods of high activity by incrementally adding resources, and then removing these resources when activity drops, to reduce costs.

value.title: Externalize the configuration of an ASP.NET app by using an Azure key vault
value.excerpt: Learn how to use ConfigurationBuilder to dynamically configure an ASP.NET web app to retrieve secrets from an Azure key vault.

value.title: Automate IoT devices management with Azure IoT Hub
value.excerpt: Automate IoT devices management with Azure IoT Hub

value.title: Automate machine learning model selection with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Learn how to use automated machine learning in Azure Machine Learning to find the best model for your data.

value.title: Automatically provision IoT devices securely and at scale with the Device Provisioning Service
value.excerpt: The focus of this module is on creating a Device Provisioning Service (DPS) to securely handle multiple remote devices. First, you create an IoT Hub, and add the DPS service. Next, an X.509 root certificate, and multiple leaf certificates, are created to handle security. Code for a simulated device is provided. You then link all the pieces together, and verify that your DPS resource works. After completing the module, you should have a good understanding of how to provision Azure IoT devices at scale.

value.title: Introduction to blockchain on Azure
value.excerpt: Introduction to blockchain on Azure. See how blockchain allows business partners to trust each other's data without a central authority. You'll also learn a bit about how blockchain works. The goal is to help you decide if blockchain is a good choice for your scenario.

value.title: Deploy and configure servers, instances, and databases for Azure SQL
value.excerpt: Deploy and configure servers, instances, and databases for Azure SQL
